title: "I wish I could show you when you are hurting lonely confused or in darkness,  the Astonishing Light...

attachments.displayName: "I wish I could show you when you are hurting lonely confused or in darkness,  the Astonishing Light of your Own Being. We each have such wonderful, beautiful light living within us. The aim of life is to live and to live means to be aware, joyously, drunkenly, serenely, divinely aware of our own source of light. Each day let that Light of Your Own Being ... Shine!"

object.content: "I wish I could show you when you are hurting lonely confused or in darkness,  the Astonishing Light of your Own Being. We each have such wonderful, beautiful light living within us. The aim of life is to live and to live means to be aware, joyously, drunkenly, serenely, divinely aware of our own source of light. Each day let that Light of Your Own Being ... Shine!"
